DOC.brief_summary: The purpose post-approval study evaluate long-term performance GORE TAG® Thoracic Endoprosthesis ( TAG device ) primary treatment descend thoracic aortic ( DTA ) aneurysms
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation GORE TAG Thoracic Endoprosthesis Treatment Aneurysms
DOC.criteria: 1 . Descending thoracic aortic aneurysm deem warrant surgical repair : 1 . Fusiform aneurysm great equal 2 time diameter normal adjacent aorta 2 . Saccular aneurysm 2 . Anatomy meet GORE TAG Thoracic Endoprosthesis specification criterion indicate Instructions Use ( Appendix A ) 3 . Minimum 2 cm nonaneurysmal segment proximal distal aneurysm • < 60 degree angle aortic arch may require additional length nonaneurysmal segment arch include treatment segment 4 . Life expectancy > 2 year 5 . Surgical Candidate ASA Class I , II , III , IV NYHA Class I , II , III heart disease 6 . Male infertile female 7 . Minimum 21 year age 8 . Able comply protocol requirement 9 . Signed Informed Consent Form 1 . 4 mm aortic taper inability use device different diameter , compensate taper , treatment area aorta 2 . Significant thrombus proximal distal implantation zone 3 . Mycotic aneurysm 4 . Hemodynamically unstable aneurysm rupture ( noncontained aneurysm rupture ) 5 . Acute chronic aortic dissection 6 . Planned occlusion leave carotid celiac artery 7 . `` Planned '' concomitant surgical procedure ( left subclavian transposition ) previous major surgery within 30 day 8 . Myocardial infarction cerebral vascular accident within 6 week 9 . Severe respiratory insufficiency sufficient precludes open thoracotomy 10 . Renal insufficiency ( Creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL ) without dialysis 11 . Degenerative connective tissue disease , e.g. , Marfan EhlerDanlos Syndrome 12 . Participation another investigational device drug study within 1 year 13 . Documented history drug abuse within 6 month
